records.Message:
{!Case.LastModifiedDate} 

Reference Number: {!Case.CaseNumber} 

This is a written notification from the Victorian Department of Health and Human Services.

Hi {!Account.FirstName} {!Account.LastName},

Thank you for remaining in quarantine and for helping us to slow the spread of coronavirus (COVID-19) in the Victorian community. You are now at the end of your quarantine period.

If you are experiencing any coronavirus (COVID-19) symptoms, have been exposed again to coronavirus (COVID-19) during your quarantine period or you are waiting on test results, you must remain in quarantine and please call 1300 651 160 immediately.

Visit {!Case.SurveyLinkURL__c} for more information on what to do now.
